body: Softing is a successful, independent provider of hardware and software for industrial automation and automotive electronics. SoftingRom has been founded early in 2005 as an R&D center of Softing AG Munich, with offices both in Cluj-Napoca and Miercurea Ciuc. We provide mature competences in product and project development for both Industrial Automation and Automotive Electronics business segments. It's not just software but a high level of expertise and quality in total integration with the other partners inside Softing group. •	Control unit communication and vehicle diagnostics•	Fieldbus communication technologies (wired and wireless)•	Networking of automation systems•	Fieldbus configuration and diagnostics•	Middleware(data integration) products (OPC related)•	Product Support and MaintenanceNow we are looking for .Net and C++ developers for our subsidiary from Miercurea Ciuc. Main responsibilitiesThe area covered by your responsibility is authoring (specification, engineering, test, integration, maintenance) software for real-time, multithreaded, highly deterministic and fail safe object oriented applications used throughout the lifecycle of the car production.Necessary skillsYou can help us with yours•	Proven experience in OOP•	Previous experience in C++ or .NET, WPF, WCF•	Technical background and experience in software design and development (architecting, design patterns, best practices)•	Knowledge in building modern, productive and ergonomic UI for desktop applications•	Passion for software applied in engineering•	English language (both reading and writing)•	Furthermore we expect motivation, creativity and team working capabilitiesas well as systematic and responsible working methodsWhat you could benefit of•	Attractive salary, medical services, fidelity bonus•	Highly qualified team•	Comprehensive technical trainings on our expertise area•	Positive and informal working environment•	Challenging projects for well-known customers in the industry•	The opportunity to actively contribute at the design and success of our solutionsFor more details, feel free to contact us at jobs_ro@softing.com.
